headline: Computer Engineering @ UCLA
description: Hi! I'm a Computer Engineering student at the University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA), expected to graduate in Spring 2027. Through research, hackathons, and internships, I've developed solutions in healthcare, automation, and data-driven applications. I enjoy tackling complex problems and translating ideas into scalable, efficient solutions. My goal is to leverage my skills in software engineering to build impactful solutions that drive lasting, positive change.
footnote: I am currently looking for Summer 2026 internships! Based in Los Angeles, open to relocation.
